014package org.jdbi.v3.json.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Type;
017import java.util.Optional;
018
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.JdbiOptionals;
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapperFactory;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMappers;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.result.UnableToProduceResultException;
026import org.jdbi.v3.json.EncodedJson;
027import org.jdbi.v3.json.Json;
028import org.jdbi.v3.json.JsonConfig;
029import org.jdbi.v3.json.JsonMapper;
030
031/**
032 * converts a {@code (@Json) String} fetched by another mapper into a value object
033 */
034@Json
035public class JsonColumnMapperFactory implements ColumnMapperFactory {
036    private static final String JSON_NOT_RETRIEVABLE = String.format(
037        "No column mapper found for '@%s String', or 'String'",
038        Json.class.getSimpleName()
039    );
040
041    @Override
042    public Optional<ColumnMapper<?>> build(Type type, ConfigRegistry config) {
043        ColumnMappers cm = config.get(ColumnMappers.class);
044        // look for specialized json support first, revert to simple String mapping if absent
045        ColumnMapper<String> jsonStringMapper = JdbiOptionals.findFirstPresent(
046                () -> cm.findFor(QualifiedType.of(String.class).with(EncodedJson.class)),
047                () -> cm.findFor(String.class))
048                .orElseThrow(() -> new UnableToProduceResultException(JSON_NOT_RETRIEVABLE));
049
050        final JsonMapper mapper = config.get(JsonConfig.class).getJsonMapper();
051        return Optional.of((rs, i, ctx) ->
052            mapper.fromJson(
053                    type,
054                    Optional.ofNullable(jsonStringMapper.map(rs, i, ctx))
055                            .orElse("null"), // sql null -> json null
056                    config));
057    }
058}
